wordGroup: commuter train 市郊往返列车

sentences.en: She accidentally stepped on his foot on a crowded commuter train.
sentences.cn: 她在一辆拥挤的通勤火车上不小心踩到他的脚。

sentences.en: The deal would have reduced competition in the commuter-aircraft market.
sentences.cn: 该交易本可以减少通勤飞机市场的竞争。

sentences.en: Commuter airlines fly to out-of-the-way places. And business travellers are the ones who go to those locations.
sentences.cn: 通勤航空公司飞往偏僻的地方。此外，商务旅客就是去那些地方的人。
